Line 27: Line 27:
'''''Crimson Fields''''' is a [[free software|free]] [[open source]] [[Turn-based tactics|turn-based tactical]] [[wargaming|war game]] inspired by [[Battle Isle]].<ref>[http://crimson.seul.org/about.php Crimson Fields - About]</ref>
'''''Crimson Fields''''' is a [[free software|free]] [[open source]] [[Turn-based tactics|turn-based tactical]] [[wargaming|war game]] inspired by [[Battle Isle]].<ref>[http://crimson.seul.org/about.php Crimson Fields - About]</ref>
â
The game is available for a variety of platforms, including [[Linux]], [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], [[Mac OS X]], and [[BeOS]]. Packages exist for [[FreeBSD]], [[OpenBSD]], [[pkgsrc]], [[Debian]], [[Fedora (Linux distribution)|Fedora]], [[Mandrake Linux]], [[Red Hat]] et al. It is also ported to a number of embedded devices: [[Sharp Zaurus]], [[Nokia 770]], [[Windows CE]], [[PocketPC]], [[PalmOS]] 5, [[iStation V43]] and [[GP2X]].<ref >[http://crimson.seul.org/download.php Crimson Fields - Downloads]</ref>
+
The game is available for a variety of platforms, including [[Linux]], [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]], [[Mac OS X]], and [[BeOS]]. Packages exist for [[FreeBSD]], [[OpenBSD]], [[pkgsrc]], [[Debian]], [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]], [[Mandrake Linux]], [[Red Hat]] et al. It is also ported to a number of embedded devices: [[Sharp Zaurus]], [[Nokia 770]], [[Windows CE]], [[PocketPC]], [[PalmOS]] 5, [[iStation V43]] and [[GP2X]].<ref >[http://crimson.seul.org/download.php Crimson Fields - Downloads]</ref>
